title: Sereir Tariq
text:
I’m an IT Quant at Capital Fund Management in Paris, working on options data with the data volatility team. I graduated with a Master’s in Financial Engineering from ENSIMAG in Grenoble, specializing in quantitative finance, stochastic calculus, and derivatives.
Outside of work, I enjoy exploring new technologies and problem-solving. I’m also passionate about sharing knowledge and contributing to the finance and tech communities.
Interests: Algorithmic trading, Quantitative Finance, Algorithm Development, Financial Technology, Continuous Learning



If you have questions about my work or are interested in collaborating, feel free to contact me. I am always interested in discussing workshop offerings and collaborative opportunities.
